body:
Hello everyone,


It is very sad to see our fun, caring and amazing Community Administrator, GraphixError, retire from his position. He meant so much to me personally, as well as the entire staff team and community. 

Graphix, better known as Jake, has chosen me as his successor. I can completely understand if you are surprised to see me taking on the role of the community administrator. Don't worry. I have a proposal/plan to work everything out, and have come up with numerous ideas regarding both the staff team and community. If you ever have any concerns, contact me on Skype @ PeachyYas. I'm always open to new ideas, and especially feedback. 

Best regards,

-Peachy. :)
body_tagged:
Hello everyone,


It is very sad to see our fun, caring and amazing Community Administrator, GraphixError, retire from his position. He meant so much to me personally, as well as the entire staff team and community. 

Graphix, better known as Jake, has chosen me as his successor. I can completely understand if you are surprised to see me taking on the role of the community administrator. Don't worry. I have a proposal/plan to work everything out, and have come up with numerous ideas regarding both the staff team and community. If you ever have any concerns, contact me on Skype @ PeachyYas. I'm always open to new ideas, and especially feedback. 

Best regards,

-Peachy. :)

replies.body: What doesn't make sense about that?
replies.body_tagged: What doesn't make sense about that?

reply_to.body: Thats er...not how it should work.
reply_to.body_tagged: Thats er...not how it should work.

replies.body: An outgoing staff member choosing their replacement is extremely temperamental. They could be biased about their decision, be influenced or forced into their decision or worse. When Jozz was chosen as the subsequent Director of Staff and Administration, I had already discussed it with both Max and Keenan.
replies.body_tagged: An outgoing staff member choosing their replacement is extremely temperamental. They could be biased about their decision, be influenced or forced into their decision or worse. When Jozz was chosen as the subsequent Director of Staff and Administration, I had already discussed it with both Max and Keenan.

reply_to.body: What doesn't make sense about that?
reply_to.body_tagged: What doesn't make sense about that?

replies.body: There were discussions between the other Administrators before we did anything.
replies.body_tagged: There were discussions between the other Administrators before we did anything.
